co.cask.coopr.store.credential

Interface CredentialStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncryptedCredentialStore, InProcessCredentialStore, MemcachedCredentialStore, SQLCredentialStore

    public interface CredentialStore
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    Credential store for getting, setting, and wiping sensitive information such as user credentials. Implementations should not persist any data to disk. All fields are stored as a single entity for a cluster in a tenant.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

      Wipe out all fields for all tenants and all clusters.

        Parameters:

        clusterId - Id of the cluster

        fields for the tenant and cluster
        Throws:
